about_the_game:
The Public Energy expansion is Season 12 of SnowRunner. Included in the Year 3 Pass. Requires the base game SnowRunner to run.

North Carolina’s state government needs you to assist in the establishment of a nuclear power station by delivering its reactor and building its support facilities, in addition to helping local farmers cultivate their crops. Step up to the task with two new vehicles across four brand new maps.

The Season 12: Public Energy expansion includes:

• Four new 4km² American maps. Visit this green North Carolina haven and its local industries.
• Two new vehicles: the MTB 8106 Rock Grinder, a formidable scout with fantastic ground clearance, and the FEMM 37-AT, an imposing heavy-duty truck, capable of delivering all cargo without limitations.
• New activities: transport essential cargo for the plant reactor’s construction, monitor its environmental impact on the region, deliver water tanks to the farmsteads and play a role in the local scientific advancement in North Carolina.

North Carolina’s state government needs you to assist in the establishment of a nuclear power station by delivering its reactor and building its support facilities, in addition to helping local farmers cultivate their crops. Step up to the task with two new vehicles across four brand new maps.

The Season 12: Public Energy expansion includes:

• Four new 4km² American maps. Visit this green North Carolina haven and its local industries.
• Two new vehicles: the MTB 8106 Rock Grinder, a formidable scout with fantastic ground clearance, and the FEMM 37-AT, an imposing heavy-duty truck, capable of delivering all cargo without limitations.
• New activities: transport essential cargo for the plant reactor’s construction, monitor its environmental impact on the region, deliver water tanks to the farmsteads and play a role in the local scientific advancement in North Carolina.

name: SnowRunner - Season 12: Public Energy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i3-4130 3.4 GHz / AMD Ryzen 3 2200U 3.4 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB, GeForce GTX 660 / Radeon R9 270
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i7-8700 3.2 GHz / AMD Ryzen 7 2700 3.2 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB, GeForce GTX 970 / Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Season 12: Public Energy is included in the Year 3 Pass. Requires the base game SnowRunner to run. North Carolina’s state government needs you to assist in the establishment of a nuclear power station and to help local farmers cultivate their crops.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
